Text: NEW Receive your Pacific Bell bill onlinecampaignhelpgif campaignhelpgif campaignhelpgif campaignhelpgif campaignhelpgif campaignhelpgif campaignpacbellgif campaignlinegif campaignsbcgif campaignhelpgif campaignhelpgif campaignhelpgif Dear Jeffrey Dasovich Weve noticed you are currently paying your Pacific Bell bill online through a bill payment provider Did you know you can receive your Pacific Bell bill electronically as well Its convenient easy and theres no additional charge campaignmakespayinggif You can receive your bill review your charges and pay with just a few clicks of your mouse Youll also be able to campaignbulletgifGet answers to Frequently Asked Questions campaignbulletgifReceive your bill sooner than you would through the mail campaignbulletgifStore your last statements for easy reference campaignbulletgifPrint your online statements for record keeping campaignbulletgifAccess Pacific Bells website for product and service information campaignmakepayinggif Activate Pacific Bell Ebill today Simply log in to your payment provider and reference the Frequently Asked Questions for instructions on how to activate an electronic bill If you have any questions you can contact your payment provider for support Its that simple campaignhelpgif campaignhelpgif To unsubscribe simply reply to this email and write unsubscribe in the subject line campaignblankgifciduid
